content: the clouds crochet and looks nice but you can use any method you like weave in all remaining ends and enjoy your soft new scarf *scarf pictured is a double infinity using caron cakes yarn* this pattern is for personal use only pattern and photos are property of above the clouds crochet you are welcome to sell any finished products made using this pattern but please credit above the clouds crochet where possible distribution of this pattern in whole or in part is not allowed if sharing on social media i would love to see your finished work use the hashtag #tempestscarf or tag me @abovethecloudscrochet tempest scarf 3 © above the clouds crochet
